channel.title: Advanced Mark Read
channel.description:
Okay I am not a site developer or anything so some of you site pro's feel free to explain this in better terms...
Currently the way it is on here is like this:
-you go to an index section that is marked unread you will see the unread topics -you can then go back to the main index board and it will show that board/sub board as read -however if you go BACK to the board that was originally unread it will still show the unread topics. So in reality it did a false reading on the index for that reading on the main index... (I assume it's considering the sub board index read that's the reason)
My suggestion: to make it so you have the OPTION at least to have it stay as mark unread until you tell it otherwise. I can't even start to fathom the amount of times I may click in one section, go to one topic in that section, go to another board , go to a topic, and then have to find the original index I was in.
